//Pranet Verma
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    std::ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0);
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    map<string,string> M;
    M["8"]="ate";
    M["w8"]="wait";
    M["gr8"]="great";
    M["4"]="for";
    M["b4"]="before";
    string s;
    getline(cin,s);        

    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        getline(cin,s);        
        stringstream ss(s);
        while(ss>>s)
            cout<<(M.find(s)==M.end()?s:M[s])<<" ";
        cout<<"\n";
    } 
}
